manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hello! Welcome to UTCOCO store! Thank you for your love and support! Summer is coming, it's time to treat yourself to a new pair of comfy pants!

High Waisted Wide Leg Pants For Women -- SHOP IT NOW! You can pair it with a tank top, sandals, and straw hat to create a beach look, or you can pair it with a loose shirt, tucked into your pants or not for different look. At the same time, you can also pair it with a crop top and high heels to highlight your figure and make your legs look longer.

Front & Back Display SUMMER CASUAL HIGH WAISTED COTTON LINEN PANTS FOR WOMEN The elastic waist with drawstring design can adapt well to your waist circumference. This wide leg pants are made of high-quality cotton and linen fabric, which is soft and skin friendly, lightweight and breathable, comfortable to wear.

Fashion Versatile Wide Leg Pants For Women -- YOUR BEST CHOICE! COLOR & SIZE - 8 colors are available. Size from Small to XX-Large. 30 DAYS FREE TRY - Return of goods without reasons within 30 days. CUSTOMER FIRST - If you’re not completely satisfied, let us know via Amazon and we will make things right.
Premium Fabric -- Give you unprecedented comfort! GARMENT CARE : Hand wash / Machine wash, do not bleach, classification of washing, iron on low heat, line dry.

Hope this reference can help you choose the right size: WARM PROMPT: Please measure your bust and waist circumference and refer to the seller's size chart before placing an order, not Amazon's size chart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfection for women like me.
reviews.reviewText: To say I am happy with these trouser’s is an understatement. I am 5’3”, and finding pants to fit has always been a nightmare. Now I am older too, and I have the rounded belly to account for. Sheesh! Pants are always too long, and too tight around the waist, or too baggy.Very badly needing new clothes, I ordered these in Navy, fully expecting to return them. I still cannot believe they fit. I listened to all the reviews and ordered Large instead of my usual XL for everything. They are fabulous! They are just a little long, but in a flattering way, like in the picture.I had expected a drawstring closure only, so I was disappointed with the elastic band, but the trousers are high-waisted, so it doesn't squeeze my tummy.These pants can be dressed up or down, perfect for any occasion. I live in a nice town where women wear exactly this look. I tried to find them last year with zero success.I still can’t believe it! I ordered three more in different colors, including black. A nice pair of black trousers is a must in the wardrobe, and now I will have them in mine.Special Note: Get a bit wrinkly after washing when hung to dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super Cute and Comfortable!
reviews.reviewText: Great material, light weight, great lines. I am a size 4-6 and these fit perfectly. You can cinch the bottoms or not, a great option. I would order again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super comfy and cute
reviews.reviewText: These were my first pair of wide-leg pants. I was afraid they might look like pajama pants, but they don't. They are thick enough to not show panty lines but lightweight enough to be cool. They did come pretty creased, but the steamer took care of that in just a couple of minutes. Fit really well. I am 5' 7" and do have extra long legs, so if you are on the shorter side, they might be a little long, but for me they were perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the fabric but the waist band is tight while the fit is perfect everywhere else and makes these pants not so comfortable. A large would be way too big on me so hopefully in time the elastic will relax.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and well made
reviews.reviewText: These pants are perfect for a cool summer pant. The fit is perfect and the pant is well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am very dissatisfied with these pants. The first time I wore them they were great! I washed them and put them away. I get them out today and they are inches shorter than the first time I wore them. I would return them if I still could.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just as advertised!
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical. I had purchased a shirt by this company and while it is a teeny tiny tiny bit small, I love it! Timely, perfect for summer and really well made. Decided to take a chance and wow. Good quality, seems very well made, nicely lightweight but not see through or flimsy, and long. Very long as in the picture. I love them. Bought 2 pair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Way too short!
reviews.reviewText: I’m 5’8’ and ordered an XL. These are seriously like way too short. You can see in the pic. I did have to been over a bit to get the pic but they are still a good 4-5 inches short. Definitely nothing like the advertisement. They should advertise these a petite. Material and quality is ok which is why I gave it 2 stars. No point in exchanging to get another pair that’s ridiculously short. I was disappointed: I’ve been eyeballing these for a few weeks and splurged. Wish I hadn’t.
